allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Engineering Metrics Dashboard

A comprehensive dashboard for tracking team engineering metrics from GitHub and Jira.

Features:
- Multi-team support with separate dashboards
- GitHub metrics: PRs, reviews, commits, cycle time
- Jira metrics: throughput, WIP, bugs, blocked items
- Person-level contribution tracking \(365-day rolling window\)
- Team comparison charts
- GraphQL API integration for efficient data collection
- Responsive dashboard with Plotly visualizations

Tech Stack:
- Python 3.13
- Flask for web dashboard
- GitHub GraphQL API v4
- Jira REST API with Bearer token auth
- Pandas for data processing
- Plotly for interactive charts

EOF
\)")
